import { useState } from "react"; function User() { const [userData, setUserData] = useState({ email: "", phone: "", name: "", registrationDate: "", ordersCount: 0, petsCount: 0, id: "" }); return (

Личный кабинет - {userData.name || "Пользователь"}

{/* Уведомления об успехе */}
Данные пользователя
setUserData({...userData, name: e.target.value})} />
setUserData({...userData, email: e.target.value})} />
setUserData({...userData, phone: e.target.value})} />
);} export default User;
